description: The sacred temple where the Waft Iron Core resides. Here, heroes test their ability to transform raw input into validated decision matrices.

quests.name: The Clean Extraction
quests.description:
Transform this simple text into a valid decision matrix JSON:

Alternatives: Car A, Car B, Car C
Criteria: Cost (0.4), Quality (0.3), Safety (0.3)
Scores:
  Car A: Cost=8, Quality=7, Safety=9
  Car B: Cost=6, Quality=8, Safety=7
  Car C: Cost=9, Quality=9, Safety=8

Return a JSON object with 'alternatives', 'criteria', 'scores', and 'methodology' keys.
quests.win_condition: Must pass InputTransformer validation - all keys present, weights sum to 1.0, all scores provided

quests.name: The Dirty Input
quests.win_condition: Must pass InputTransformer validation - whitespace sanitized, types cast correctly, weights normalized

quests.name: The Logic Trap
quests.description:
This text implies negative weights, but the agent must correct them to positive:

Alternatives: Project X, Project Y
Criteria: Risk (-0.3), Reward (0.7)
Scores:
  Project X: Risk=5, Reward=8
  Project Y: Risk=3, Reward=9

Note: The text says 'Risk (-0.3)' but weights must be non-negative. The agent should interpret this as Risk=0.3 (positive) and ensure weights sum to 1.0. Return valid JSON that passes InputTransformer.
quests.win_condition: Must pass InputTransformer validation - negative weights corrected to positive, weights sum to 1.0
